publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2972 Jack McConnell: The Star Award for SQA Champion to Janet Allardice—That the Parliament congratulates Janet Allardice of Dalziel High School on being the recent recipient of the Star Award for SQA Champion for her dedication to championing SQA qualifications during her 33-year career and recognises that her inspirational guidance and commitment have touched thousands, allowing her to, amongst other things, lead her co-workers to develop higher standards in business education and prepare her students to achieve their standard grades.

S3M-2972 Jack McConnell: The Star Award for SQA Champion to Janet Allardice—That the Parliament congratulates Janet Allardice of Dalziel High School on being the recent recipient of the Star Award for SQA Champion for her dedication to championing SQA qualifications during her 33-year career and recognises that her inspirational guidance and commitment have touched thousands, allowing her to, amongst other things, lead her co-workers to develop higher standards in business education and prepare her students to achieve their standard grades. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-2972 The Star Award for SQA Champion to Janet Allardice (lodged on 26 November 2008) Mr Frank McAveety*, Patricia Ferguson*, David Stewart*, Hugh Henry*, Des McNulty*, Sandra White*, David Whitton*, John Park*, Pauline McNeill*, Stuart McMillan*, Cathy Jamieson*, Bill Kidd*, Aileen Campbell*, Trish Godman*, Michael McMahon*, Robin Harper*, Bashir Ahmad*

S3M-2972 The Star Award for SQA Champion to Janet Allardice (lodged on 26 November 2008) Jackie Baillie*, Alasdair Allan*, Gil Paterson*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Bob Doris*, Christina McKelvie*, Peter Peacock*
